text: Now when Jesus finished these sayings, he left Galilee and went to the region of Judea beyond the Jordan River.
Large crowds followed him, and he healed them there.
Then some Pharisees came to him in order to test him. They asked, “Is it lawful to divorce a wife for any cause?”
He answered, “Have you not read that from the beginning the Creator made them male and female,
and said, ‘For this reason a man will leave his father and mother and will be united with his wife, and the two will become one flesh’?

<st data-num="5620" class="">So</st> they <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="3765">no longer</st> <st data-num="1417" class="">two</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="444" class="">one</st> <st data-num="4561" class="">flesh</st>. <st data-num="3767" class="">Therefore</st> <st data-num="3739">what</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> has <st data-num="4801">joined together</st>, let <st data-num="3361" class="">no</st> <st data-num="444" class="">one</st> <st data-num="5563" class="">separate</st>.”
They said to him, “Why then did Moses command us to give a certificate of dismissal and to divorce her?”

Jesus<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “<st data-num="3475">Moses</st> <st data-num="2010" class="">permitted</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> to <st data-num="630" class="">divorce</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="1135" class="">wives</st> <st data-num="4314">because of</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="4641">hard hearts</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="746" class="">beginning</st> it <st data-num="1096" class="">was</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="3779">this way</st>.

<st data-num="1161">Now</st> I <st data-num="3004" class="">say</st> to <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="3739">whoever</st> <st data-num="630" class="">divorces</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="1135" class="">wife</st>, <st data-num="3361" class="">except</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">for</st> <st data-num="4202" class="">immorality</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1060" class="">marries</st> <st data-num="243" class="">another</st> <st data-num="3429">commits adultery</st>.”

The<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3101" class="">disciples</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “<st data-num="1487">If</st> <st data-num="3779" class="">this</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> the <st data-num="156" class="">case</st> of a <st data-num="444" class="">husband</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> a <st data-num="1135" class="">wife</st>, it <st data-num="4851">is better</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> to <st data-num="1060" class="">marry</st>!”

He<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3004">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “<st data-num="3756">Not</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">everyone</st> can <st data-num="5562" class="">accept</st> <st data-num="3778">this</st> <st data-num="3056" class="">statement</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">except</st> those to <st data-num="3739" class="">whom</st> it has been <st data-num="1325" class="">given</st>.

For there are some eunuchs who were that way from birth, and some who were made eunuchs by others, and some who became eunuchs for the sake of the kingdom of heaven. The one who is able to accept this should accept it.”
Then little children were brought to him for him to lay his hands on them and pray. But the disciples scolded those who brought them.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="3004">said</st>, “Let the <st data-num="3813">little children</st> <st data-num="2064" class="">come</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> do <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> try to <st data-num="2967" class="">stop</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, <st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> the <st data-num="932" class="">kingdom</st> of <st data-num="3772" class="">heaven</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">belongs to</st> <st data-num="1508">such as these</st>.”<n id="1" />
And he placed his hands on them and went on his way.
Now someone came up to him and said, “Teacher, what good thing must I do to gain eternal life?”

He <st data-num="3004">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “<st data-num="5101">Why</st> do you <st data-num="2065" class="">ask</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="4012" class="">about</st> what is <st data-num="18" class="">good</st>? There <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> only <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> who is <st data-num="18" class="">good</st>. <st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> you <st data-num="2309" class="">want</st> to <st data-num="1525" class="">enter</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> <st data-num="2222" class="">life</st>, <st data-num="5083" class="">keep</st> the <st data-num="1785" class="">commandments</st>.”
“Which ones?” he asked. Jesus replied, “Do not murder, do not commit adultery, do not steal, do not give false testimony,
honor your father and mother, and love your neighbor as yourself.”

The <st data-num="3495" class="">young man</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “I have wholeheartedly <st data-num="5442" class="">obeyed</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">these</st> laws.<n id="2" /> <st data-num="5101" class="">What</st> do I <st data-num="2089" class="">still</st> <st data-num="5302" class="">lack</st>?”

<st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="5346" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “<st data-num="1487">If</st> you <st data-num="2309" class="">wish</st> to <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> <st data-num="5046" class="">perfect</st>, <st data-num="5217" class="">go</st> <st data-num="4453" class="">sell</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="5225">possessions</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1325" class="">give</st> the money<n id="1" /> to the <st data-num="4434" class="">poor</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> you will <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> <st data-num="2344" class="">treasure</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3772" class="">heaven</st>. <st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st> <st data-num="1204" class="">come</st>, <st data-num="190" class="">follow</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>.”
But when the young man heard this he went away sorrowful, for he was very rich.
Then Jesus said to his disciples, “I tell you the truth, it will be hard for a rich person to enter the kingdom of heaven!

<st data-num="3825" class="">Again</st> I <st data-num="3004" class="">say</st>,<n id="1" /> it <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="2123" class="">easier</st> for a <st data-num="2574" class="">camel</st><n id="2" /> to <st data-num="1330">go through</st> the <st data-num="5169">eye</st> of a <st data-num="4476">needle</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="2228" class="">than</st> for a <st data-num="4145">rich person</st> to <st data-num="1525" class="">enter</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="932" class="">kingdom</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>.”

The<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3101" class="">disciples</st> were <st data-num="4970" class="">greatly</st> <st data-num="1605" class="">astonished</st> when they <st data-num="191" class="">heard</st> this and <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="5101" class="">Then</st> <st data-num="5101" class="">who</st> <st data-num="1410" class="">can</st> be <st data-num="4982" class="">saved</st>?”<n id="2" />

<st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1689">looked at</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> and <st data-num="2036" class="">replied</st>, “<st data-num="3778">This</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="102" class="">impossible</st> <st data-num="3844" class="">for</st> mere <st data-num="444" class="">humans</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> <st data-num="3844" class="">for</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="3956">all things</st> are <st data-num="1415" class="">possible</st>.”

<st data-num="5119" class="">Then</st> <st data-num="4074" class="">Peter</st> <st data-num="3004">said</st><n id="1" /> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “<st data-num="2400">Look</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1473" class="">we</st> have <st data-num="863" class="">left</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">everything</st> to <st data-num="190" class="">follow</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>!<n id="3" /> <st data-num="5101" class="">What</st> <st data-num="687" class="">then</st> will there <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> for <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st>?”

<st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “I <st data-num="3004" class="">tell</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> the <st data-num="281" class="">truth:</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">In</st> the <st data-num="3824">age when all things are renewed</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="3752" class="">when</st> the <st data-num="5207" class="">Son</st> of <st data-num="444" class="">Man</st> <st data-num="2523" class="">sits</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="1391" class="">glorious</st> <st data-num="2362" class="">throne</st>, <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> who have <st data-num="190" class="">followed</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> will <st data-num="4771" class="">also</st> <st data-num="2521" class="">sit</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> <st data-num="1427" class="">12</st> <st data-num="2362" class="">thrones</st>, <st data-num="2919" class="">judging</st><n id="4" /> the <st data-num="1427" class="">12</st> <st data-num="5443" class="">tribes</st> of <st data-num="2474" class="">Israel</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> <st data-num="3748" class="">whoever</st> has <st data-num="863" class="">left</st> <st data-num="3614" class="">houses</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="80" class="">brothers</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="79" class="">sisters</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="3962" class="">father</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="3384" class="">mother</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="5043" class="">children</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="68" class="">fields</st> <st data-num="1752" class="">for</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="3686">sake</st> will <st data-num="2983" class="">receive</st> a <st data-num="4179">hundred times</st> as much<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> will <st data-num="2816" class="">inherit</st> <st data-num="166" class="">eternal</st> <st data-num="2222" class="">life</st>.
But many who are first will be last, and the last first.
